[DQC.US.0187.10173] The value of PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross is reported as 82,728,000,000. The dimensional breakdown of PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross using the axis PropertyPlantAndEquipmentByTypeAxis aggregates to a total of 157,518,000,000. This is more than the value of PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.
